CustomField.description: Calculation = (Total Building RSF - Total Building ABOA SF) / Total Building ABOA SF. Auto calc when Total Building ABOA SF is input ; expressed as a %. This was created as a percent instead of as a formula field because the calculation happens on the external site automatically when the user inputs the 2 values in the calculation, so the final percentage value should be calculated in the controller.
CustomField.label: Building Common Area Factor
